messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

leave code oracle sent tuesday problem hello have problem when trying submit card please attached screens can submit card contains leave because task details set but task details nothing select thank you best regards tester

message.reasoning:
**Categorizing IT Tickets**

I'm currently analyzing the provided ticket text to determine the most appropriate category. My focus is on identifying keywords and context clues within "leave code oracle sent tuesday problem hello have problem when" to map it to one of the available options: ["Hardware", "HR Support", "Access", "Miscellaneous ", "Storage", "Purchase", "Internal Project", "Administrative rights"].

**Refining Ticket Classification**

I'm refining my analysis of the ticket text, specifically the phrase "leave code oracle sent tuesday problem hello have problem when trying submit card please attached screens can submit card contains leave because task details set but task details nothing select thank you best regards tester." My current inclination is that this falls under "Miscellaneous" due to the combination of application-specific terms like "oracle" and "card submission" with a functional error. I'm weighing whether it could lean towards "Internal Project" if the "card submission" is a custom internal tool, but the core issue appears to be a general system malfunction.
